description: One of the Gundam mobile suits possessed by Celestial Being. Like the other Gundams, the Dynames is equipped with a GN Drive that gives it almost limitless energy and remarkable mobility. The Dynames is designed for long-range shooting, and its main weapon is a powerful GN Sniper Rifle that can destroy enemy machines from outside their sensor range. Its head changes into a sniper mode to reveal a special camera eye for precision shooting, and its cockpit is equipped with a dedicated targeting scope. The Dynames can also be outfitted with devices such as GN Beam Pistols and protective GN Shields, depending on the mission requirements.
name: GN-002 Gundam Dynames
